schemaCompliance.details: Found 7 schema types: LocalBusiness, EducationalOrganization, Event, Event, VideoObject, VideoObject, VideoObject

localSEOSignals.details: Local signals: Austin location, postal address, geo coordinates, service area

richSnippetReadiness.details: Rich snippets enabled: ratings(true), events(true), videos(true), pricing(true), offers(true)

entityRecognition.details: Entity clearly defined with organization type, location, and alternative names

reviewRatingSignals.details: Complete review system with aggregate ratings, review counts, and individual reviews

videoContentSEO.details: Video content optimized with duration, thumbnails, educational content, and audience targeting

entityExtractionClarity.details: Entity clearly defined with multiple identifiers, descriptions, and context

relationshipMapping.details: Clear relationships between courses, events, videos, and organization

contextualUnderstanding.details: Rich contextual information about dance instruction, skill levels, and specializations

aiSearchCompatibility.details: AI-compatible features: multiple schemas(true), detailed descriptions(false), hierarchical data(true)

voiceSearchOptimization.details: Optimized for voice queries about hours, location, contact, and pricing

semanticRichness.details: Rich semantic vocabulary with 10/12 advanced properties

knowledgeGraphAlignment.details: Aligned with knowledge graph standards: social links, founding date, geo data, ratings

coreWebVitalsImpact.details: Optimized loading: idle callback(true), timeouts(true), deferred execution(true)

loadTimeImpact.details: Schema size: ~31KB, Smart loading implemented, Caching enabled

renderBlockingImpact.details: Non-blocking implementation: async loading(true), deferred to idle(true)

cacheEfficiency.details: Schema caching, duplicate prevention, and DOM optimization implemented

userEngagementMetrics.details: Enhanced tracking for product views, video engagement, forms, and performance metrics
